Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Clark
ShortDescription: 12 buses temp. rerouted EB: Roosevelt, Canal, Jackson, Clark, and Roosevelt; WB: Roosevelt, Clark, Polk, Dearborn, Van Buren, Clinton and Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Clark.

Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Canal, Jackson, Clark, and Roosevelt.

Westbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Clark, Polk, Dearborn, Van Buren, Clinton and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at Midway
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing at Midway due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing at Midway due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
